Articles.Content:
OH NO- THE 502s are BACK TO HAUNT US AGAIN! EVERBODY RUN!!....

On a more serious note- as a previous thread mentioned we just encounter another 502... is this just a hiccup mods? Or is this the start of something terrible? Since I remember the days when we would get a 502 six times day without fail for a short while... I hope we're not entering into something like that again.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T02:29:57Z" title="05/04/2015 02:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by ZooNamedGames**

They're\*

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Can confirm, got them for half the day.
[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84869-502-Error-Ocurrance-List](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84869-502-Error-Ocurrance-List)

> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84869-502-Error-Ocurrance-List](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84869-502-Error-Ocurrance-List)

Yeah I know about the list- I made it ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> Yeah I know about the list- I made it ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Oh, I see. Well then...erm...should be **they're**(as in they are). ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> Oh, I see. Well then...erm...should be **they're**(as in they are). ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

What are you talking about? The title clearly says "THE 502's, THEY'RE BACK!"
Forum was 502'd for like three hours over here... ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
this is a thing.
Me too, I had to go outside instead of post my latest addition to the community laythe transfer vehicle. (It was a satellite dish.)

Yes, I can confirm that the 502 errors are back, probably because of an influx of new users due to 1.0 plus the servers not being large enough. You should have seen the load averages. They were bad. 

Unfortunately, Kaspy and Ted are off in Mexico skydiving at the moment (why wasn't I invited ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ?) So we need to wait a few days before anything can be done.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T11:16:13Z" title="05/04/2015 11:16  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by DuoDex**

> 
> Yes, I can confirm that the 502 errors are back, probably because of an influx of new users due to 1.0 plus the servers not being large Edith. You should have seen the load averages. They were bad. 
> Unfortunately, Kaspy and Ted are off in Mexico skydiving art the moment (why wasn't 8 invited ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ?) So we need to wait a few days before anything can be done.
> 
> Sorry for the inconvenience.

Can I help with the potential influx of new 502 related threads in the meantime? Since I'd like to help if I can...

> 
> Can I help with the potential influx of new 502 related threads in the meantime? Since I'd like to help if I can...

Just report them, I think.

What a time for the senior moderation staff to be gone :/

It was so bad I couldn't even *load* the page that displays the load averages.
were you serious about Kasper and Ted skydiving? :envy:

> 
> Yes, I can confirm that the 502 errors are back, probably because of an influx of new users due to 1.0 plus the servers not being large enough. You should have seen the load averages. They were bad. 
> Unfortunately, Kaspy and Ted are off in Mexico skydiving at the moment (why wasn't I invited ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ?) So we need to wait a few days before anything can be done.
> 
> Sorry for the inconvenience.

So it's not DDOS? Whew!

> 
> So it's not DDOS? Whew!

Not an intentional DDoS, just an accidental one.

> 
> Not an intentional DDoS, just an accidental one.

Wow, we accidentally DDOS'd ourselves. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

> 
> Yes, I can confirm that the 502 errors are back, probably because of an influx of new users due to 1.0 plus the servers not being large enough. You should have seen the load averages. They were bad. 
> Unfortunately, Kaspy and Ted are off in Mexico skydiving at the moment (why wasn't I invited ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ?) So we need to wait a few days before anything can be done.
> 
> Sorry for the inconvenience.

That's fair! (save for the skydiving part ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) I SO want to do that!)

> 
> ...
> Unfortunately, Kaspy and Ted are off in Mexico skydiving at the moment (why wasn't I invited ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ?) So we need to wait a few days before anything can be done.
> 
> Sorry for the inconvenience.

Wait, the new aeros allow for skydiving?!?! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

> 
> Wait, the new aeros allow for skydiving?!?! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

it looks like the next version of realchutes will have kerbalchutes added so yes, if you have realchutes installed, you can go skydiving...

(and with a 21km physics range you can watch them all the way down)

[Looks like we've already got a thread for this.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119171-Bad-Gateway)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T02:23:46Z" title="05/05/2015 02:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**
